languages.text: "Ах, шерин, в какие сдержанные и скромные слова вы смогли обернуть ту страсть, что я разжигаю в вашем сердце. Мне не дано подобного риторического совершенства, потому я отвечу более пылко: я тоже счастлива, что Великий сплел наши судьбы".

"Ah, shereen, you found the most discreet and frugal words to wrap the passion I kindle in your heart. I am not endowed with such rhetorical perfection, so I will respond more ardently: I too am glad that the Exalted One wove our destinies together."
languages.original_text: "Ах, шерин, в какие сдержанные и скромные слова вы смогли обернуть ту страсть, что я разжигаю в вашем сердце. Мне не дано подобного риторического совершенства, потому я отвечу более пылко: я тоже счастлива, что Великий сплел наши судьбы".

traits.locale_text: "Ah, shereen, you found the most discreet and frugal words to wrap the passion I kindle in your heart. I am not endowed with such rhetorical perfection, so I will respond more ardently: I too am happy that the Exalted One has woven our destinies together."

"Ah, shereen, you found the most discreet and frugal words to wrap the passion I kindle in your heart. I am not endowed with such rhetorical perfection, so I will respond more ardently: I too am happy that the Exalted One has woven our destinies together."

"Ah, shereen, you found the most discreet and frugal words to wrap the passion I kindle in your heart. I am not endowed with such rhetorical perfection, so I will respond more ardently: I too am happy that the Exalted One wove our destinies together."

"Ah, shereen, you found the most discreet and frugal words to wrap the passion I kindle in your heart. I am not endowed with such rhetorical perfection, so I will respond more ardently: I too am happy that the Exalted One wove our destinies together."

"Ah, shereen, you found the most discreet and frugal words to wrap the passion I kindle in your heart. I am not endowed with such rhetorical perfection, so I will respond more ardently: I too am glad that the Exalted One wove our destinies together."

languages.text: “啊，亲爱的，你以最谨慎、最朴素的字眼，来形容我在你心中点燃的激情。我的措辞没有这么完美，所以我会更加热情地回答：我很也高兴，至高无上的神皇将我们的命运编织在一起。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, you found the most discreet and frugal words to wrap the passion I kindle in your heart. I am not endowed with such rhetorical perfection, so I will respond more ardently: I too am glad that the Exalted One wove our destinies together."

traits.locale_text: “啊，亲爱的，你以最谨慎、最朴素的字眼，来形容我在你心中点燃的激情。我的措辞没有这么完美，所以我会更加热情地回答：我很也高兴，至高无上的神皇将我们的命运编织在一起。”

languages.text: «Ah, shereen, has encontrado las palabras más discretas y frugales para expresar la pasión que despierto en tu corazón. Yo no puedo ni soñar con igualar tu perfección retórica, por lo que daré una respuesta más apasionada: yo también me alegro de que el Exaltado haya entrelazado nuestros destinos».
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, you found the most discreet and frugal words to wrap the passion I kindle in your heart. I am not endowed with such rhetorical perfection, so I will respond more ardently: I too am glad that the Exalted One wove our destinies together."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, shereen, has encontrado las palabras más discretas y frugales para expresar la pasión que despierto en tu corazón. Yo no puedo ni soñar con igualar tu perfección retórica, por lo que daré una respuesta más apasionada: yo también me alegro de que el Exaltado haya entrelazado nuestros destinos».

languages.text: 「ああ、シャリーン、あたしがあんたの心に火をともした情熱を包む、一番地味で冴えない言葉を見つけてくれたのね。あたしはそんな完璧な表現力なんて持ち合わせてないから、もっと熱烈に応えてあげるわ。エグザルテッド・ワンがあたしたちの運命を一緒に織り込んでくれたなんて、最高に幸せよ」
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, you found the most discreet and frugal words to wrap the passion I kindle in your heart. I am not endowed with such rhetorical perfection, so I will respond more ardently: I too am glad that the Exalted One wove our destinies together."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、シャリーン、あたしがあんたの心に火をともした情熱を包む、一番地味で冴えない言葉を見つけてくれたのね。あたしはそんな完璧な表現力なんて持ち合わせてないから、もっと熱烈に応えてあげるわ。エグザルテッド・ワンがあたしたちの運命を一緒に織り込んでくれたなんて、最高に幸せよ」

languages.text: "Ach, Shereen, Ihr habt die diskretesten und sparsamsten Wörter gefunden, um die Leidenschaft einzupacken, die ich in Eurem Herzen entzünde. Ich bin nicht mit einer solchen rhetorischen Perfektion gesegnet, daher fällt meine Antwort glühender aus: Auch ich bin froh, dass der Erhabene unsere Bestimmungen zusammengewebt hat."
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, you found the most discreet and frugal words to wrap the passion I kindle in your heart. I am not endowed with such rhetorical perfection, so I will respond more ardently: I too am glad that the Exalted One wove our destinies together."

traits.locale_text: "Ach, Shereen, Ihr habt die diskretesten und sparsamsten Wörter gefunden, um die Leidenschaft einzupacken, die ich in Eurem Herzen entzünde. Ich bin nicht mit einer solchen rhetorischen Perfektion gesegnet, daher fällt meine Antwort glühender aus: Auch ich bin glücklich, dass der Erhabene unsere Bestimmungen zusammengewebt hat."

languages.text: « Ah, shereen, vous avez su trouver les mots les plus pudiques propres à exprimer la passion que j'attise dans votre cœur. Pour ma part, je ne peux me targuer d'une telle perfection oratoire, aussi ma réponse sera-t-elle plus brusque. Je me réjouis moi aussi que l'Exalté ait lié nos destins. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, you found the most discreet and frugal words to wrap the passion I kindle in your heart. I am not endowed with such rhetorical perfection, so I will respond more ardently: I too am glad that the Exalted One wove our destinies together."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, shereen, vous avez su trouver les mots les plus pudiques propres à exprimer la passion que j'attise dans votre cœur. Pour ma part, je ne peux me targuer d'une telle perfection oratoire, aussi ma réponse sera-t-elle plus brusque. Je me réjouis moi aussi que l'Exalté ait lié nos destins. »

languages.text: "Şirinim, kalbinde ateşlediğim o tutkuyu özetlemek için en ketum ve sade sözcükleri seçmeyi başardın. Bana söz sanatlarını bu kadar kusursuz kullanma yeteneği bahşedilmemiş, o yüzden ben daha şevkli bir yanıt vermek durumundayım: Görkemli, kaderlerimizin ipliklerini birbirine işlediği için çok ama çok mutluyum."
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, you found the most discreet and frugal words to wrap the passion I kindle in your heart. I am not endowed with such rhetorical perfection, so I will respond more ardently: I too am glad that the Exalted One wove our destinies together."
